metadata.Title: CVE-2022-36760 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Inconsistent Interpretation of HTTP Requests ('HTTP Request Smuggling') vulnerability in mod_proxy_ajp of Apache HTTP Server allows an attacker to smuggle requests to the AJP server it forwards requests to. This issue affects Apache HTTP Server Apache HTTP Server 2.4 version 2.4.54 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: apache2 package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
apache2 package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
